00058 class LogFile
00059 {
00060 public:
00065         enum Type {
00066                 Channel = 0,   
00067                 Console = 1,   
00068                 Query   = 2,   
00069                 DccChat = 3,   
00070                 Other   = 4,   
00071         };
00072 
00077         enum ExportType {
00078                 PlainText,   
00079                 HTML,        
00080                 //XML,         /**< export log in a XML file */
00081                 //DB           /**< export log in a database file */
00082         };
00083 
00089         LogFile(const QString & szName);
00090 private:
00091         Type    m_eType;
00092         QString m_szType;
00093         QString m_szFilename;
00094         bool    m_bCompressed;
00095         QString m_szName;
00096         QString m_szNetwork;
00097         QDate   m_date;
00098 public:
00103         Type type() const { return m_eType; };
00104 
00109         const QString & typeString() const { return m_szType; };
00110 
00115         const QString & fileName() const { return m_szFilename; };
00116 
00121         const QString & name() const { return m_szName; };
00122 
00127         const QString & network() const { return m_szNetwork; };
00128 
00133         const QDate & date() const { return m_date; };
00134 
00140         void getText(QString & szText);
00141 };
